verses.text: But now thus saith the \sc Lord\sc* that created thee, O Jacob, And he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called \add thee\add* by thy name; thou \add art\add* mine.

When thou passest through the waters, I \add will be\add* with thee; And through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: When thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burnt; Neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.
For I \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc* thy God, The Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour: I gave Egypt \add for\add* thy ransom, Ethiopia and Seba for thee.
Since thou wast precious in my sight, Thou hast been honourable, and I have loved thee: Therefore will I give men for thee, And people for thy life.
Fear not: for I \add am\add* with thee: I will bring thy seed from the east, And gather thee from the west;
I will say to the north, Give \add up;\add* And to the south, Keep not back: Bring my sons from far, And my daughters from the ends of the earth;
\add Even\add* every one that is called by my name: For I have created him for my glory, I have formed him; yea, I have made him.
Bring forth the blind people that have eyes, And the deaf that have ears.

Let all the nations be gathered together, And let the people be assembled: Who among them can declare this, And shew us former \add things?\add* Let them bring forth their witnesses, that they may be justified: Or let them hear, and say, \add It is\add* truth.

Ye \add are\add* my witnesses, saith the \sc Lord\sc*, And my servant whom I have chosen: That ye may know and believe me, And understand that I \add am\add* he: Before me there was no God formed, Neither shall there be after me.
I, \add even\add* I, \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc*; And beside me \add there is\add* no saviour.

I have declared, and have saved, and I have shewed, When \add there was\add* no strange \add god\add* among you: Therefore ye \add are\add* my witnesses, saith the \sc Lord\sc*, that I \add am\add* God.
Yea, before the day \add was\add* I \add am\add* he; And \add there is\add* none that can deliver out of my hand: I will work, and who shall let it?

Thus saith the \sc Lord\sc*, your redeemer, the Holy One of Israel; For your sake I have sent to Babylon, And have brought down all their nobles, And the Chaldeans, whose cry \add is\add* in the ships.
I \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc*, your Holy One, The creator of Israel, your King.
Thus saith the \sc Lord\sc*, which maketh a way in the sea, And a path in the mighty waters;
Which bringeth forth the chariot and horse, the army and the power; They shall lie down together, they shall not rise: They are extinct, they are quenched as tow.
Remember ye not the former \add things\add*, Neither consider the \add things\add* of old.
Behold, I will do a new \add thing;\add* Now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, \add And\add* rivers in the desert.
The beast of the field shall honour me, The dragons and the owls: Because I give waters in the wilderness, \add And\add* rivers in the desert, To give drink to my people, my chosen.
This people have I formed for myself; They shall shew forth my praise.
But thou hast not called upon me, O Jacob; But thou hast been weary of me, O Israel.

Thou hast not brought me the small cattle of thy burnt offerings; Neither hast thou honoured me \add with\add* thy sacrifices. I have not caused thee to serve with an offering, Nor wearied thee with incense.

Thou hast bought me no sweet cane with money, Neither hast thou filled me \add with\add* the fat of thy sacrifices: But thou hast made me to serve with thy sins, Thou hast wearied me with thine iniquities.
I, \add even\add* I, \add am\add* he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, And will not remember thy sins.
Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: Declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.
Thy first father hath sinned, And thy teachers have transgressed against me.
Therefore I have profaned the princes of the sanctuary, And have given Jacob to the curse, And Israel to reproaches.
